entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
